ModMetaData.name: Extra Alerts
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some useful alerts, with options to disable ones you don't want. Includes: [list] [*]Caravan paused and awaiting instructions (1.0 only) [*]Tainted clothing [*]Human leather worn by pawn who doesn't like it [*]Lovers not sharing a bed [*]Non-lovers sharing a bed [*]Ascetic has nice bedroom [*]Bonded animal not assigned to bonded master [*]Ally needs rescue [*]Enemy needs rescues [/list] Safe to add and remove
Japanese translation by Proxyer French translation by DrTCS
[url=https://github.com/Zylleon/ExtraAlerts/releases/latest]Github link[/url]
